_header: Man if thou has sinned ought / Change readily thy thought
_description: Think on Christ’s Passion — eight quatrains (aab) and burden: ‘Synge we synge we / Gloria tibi domine’

BLSl2593.First Lines:
Man if þou hast synnyd owthChaunge redely þi
                    þowgh…
BLSl2593.Last Lines:
…Forsake ti synne & to hym cryÞat he haue mercy vpon
                    the
